column1: Smoque BBQ////My friend Ewa and I went here for dinner tonight because she loves ribs and Smoque is famous for their ribs.  She ordered 1/2 and 1/2 Rib Plate
column2: which is half slab Baby Back and half slab St Louis style ribs.  For a skinny Polish girl
column3: she can throw down some ribs.  300 lb police officers were in there getting to-go boxes for the same thing
column4: but Ewa ate every morsel and left a pile of bones on her plate!  I had beef brisket sandwich and mac and cheese.  Our clothes still reek of BBQ.  The owner was so friendly and delivered our food to our table for us
column5: then brought us extra bread warmed up just for us!  It was worth the 20 minute wait in line.
